Title: Open a Metro Style App from Desktop App
Description: Many people said that we can't open a MetroStyle App from WPF or any desktop App. Here I give you simple solution to solve this problem.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a Simple project helps in opening a Metro Style Application from any desktop Application.
Many people said that you can't open Metro App from desktop Application. So today I am giving you this source code example that shows you how you a trick to open the Metro App.
Enjoy
